amendment.description: To provide that funds appropriated for United States Coast Guard Acquisition, Construction, and Improvement may be used to acquire law enforcement patrol boats.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4639 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4639 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S7470-7472; text: CR S7470) To provide that funds appropriated for United States Coast Guard Acquisition, Construction, and Improvement may be used to acquire law enforcement patrol boats.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4639 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4639 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Murray.
